custom_fields.label: Work Status
custom_fields.name: Attendance-location
custom_fields.options:
Working From Home
Office
Task In Cairo
Task in Great Cairo
Overnight Task
Stand By
Vacation
Travelling

custom_fields.label: Team and Customer Relation
custom_fields.name: Attendance-team_and_customer_relation
custom_fields.options:
Bad (If received any trusted complains from Team or customers)
Normal
Good (If received any trusted praise from Team or customers)

custom_fields.label: Extra Bonus
custom_fields.name: Attendance-extra_bonus
custom_fields.options:
0
5 (Participating with an a new accepted idea)
10 (Solving a problem that the company is facing it for the first time)
15 (Solving a problem out of the employee's job description)

custom_fields.label: Working in a vacation
custom_fields.name: Attendance-working_in_a_vacation_
custom_fields.options:
0
1 Hour (4 Points)
2 Hours (8 Points)
3 Hours (12 Points)
4 Hours (16 Points)

custom_fields.label: Productivty
custom_fields.name: Attendance-productivty
custom_fields.options:
Very Low Productivity (Equivalent to 0-2:59 HARD-WORKING Hours)
Below Average (Equivalent to 3-5:59 HARD-WORKING Hours)
Average (Equivalent to 6-8:59 HARD-WORKING Hours)
Above Average (Equivalent to 9-10:59 HARD-WORKING Hours)
Very High Productivity (Equivalent to 11-13:59 HARD-WORKING Hours)

property_setters.name: Attendance-status-options
property_setters.value:
Present
Absent
On Leave
